Name: WEBSERVERID
Purpose: Session cookie to identify the current web server in use (t4web1 / t4web2) for load balancing.

Name: JSESSIONID
Purpose: Session cookie to assist when loading content in the University Portal, including web forms.

Name: CookieControl
Purpose: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain.

Name: paok-shib, paokv0, paok, psess-shib, psessv0, psess, athValid
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: _____SITEGUID
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: ASP.NET_SessionId
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: DSFPartnerID
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: COMPBRANDjcksjsbopwvonovxpbiq4doi
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: LASTSITEACTIVITY
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: favs
Purpose: Used to store user selected list of favourite courses

Name: _ga
Purpose: Distinguishes users and counts how many people visit our site by tracking if you’ve visited before.

Name: _gid
Purpose: Distinguishes users and counts how many people visit our site by tracking if you’ve visited before.

Name: _dc_gtm_UA-340900-19
Purpose: Used to throttle request rate.

Name: _a_id
Purpose: Stores unique Google Analytics ID

Name: _ga_ENJQ0W7S1M
Purpose: Persists session state in Google Analytics 4.

Name: _hjClosedSurveyInvites
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set once a user interacts with an External Link Survey invitation modal. It is used to ensure that the same invite does not reappear if it has already been shown.

Name: _hjDonePolls
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set once a user completes a survey using the On-site Survey widget. It is used to ensure that the same survey does not reappear if it has already been filled in.

Name: _hjMinimizedPolls
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set once a user minimizes an On-site Survey widget. It is used to ensure that the widget stays minimized when the user navigates through your site.

Name: _hjShownFeedbackMessage
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set when a user minimizes or completes Incoming Feedback. This is done so that the Incoming Feedback will load as minimised immediately if the user navigates to another page where it is set to show.

Name: _hjSessionTooLarge
Purpose: Causes Hotjar to stop collecting data if a session becomes too large. This is determined automatically by a signal from the WebSocket server if the session size exceeds the limit.

Name: _hjSessionRejected
Purpose: If present, this cookie will be set to '1' for the duration of a user's session, if Hotjar rejected the session from connecting to our WebSocket due to server overload. This cookie is only applied in extremely rare situations to prevent severe performance issues.

Name: _hjSessionResumed
Purpose: A cookie is set when a session/recording is reconnected to Hotjar servers after a break in connection.

Name: _hjid
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set when the customer first lands on a page with the Hotjar script. It is used to persist the Hotjar User ID, unique to that site on the browser. This ensures that behaviour in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID.

Name: _hjRecordingLastActivity
Purpose: This should be found in Session storage (as opposed to cookies). This gets updated when a user recording starts and when data is sent through the WebSocket (the user performs an action that Hotjar records).

Name: _hjTLDTest
Purpose: When the Hotjar script executes we try to determine the most generic cookie path we should use, instead of the page hostname. This is done so that cookies can be shared across subdomains (where applicable). To determine this, we try to store the _hjTLDTest cookie for different URL substring alternatives until it fails. After this check, the cookie is removed.

Name: _hjUserAttributesHash
Purpose: User Attributes sent through the Hotjar Identify API are cached for the duration of the session in order to know when an attribute has changed and needs to be updated.

Name: _hjCachedUserAttributes
Purpose: This cookie stores User Attributes which are sent through the Hotjar Identify API, whenever the user is not in the sample. Collected attributes will only be saved to Hotjar servers if the user interacts with a Hotjar Feedback tool, but the cookie will be used regardless of whether a Feedback tool is present.

Name: _hjLocalStorageTest
Purpose: This cookie is used to check if the Hotjar Tracking Script can use local storage. If it can, a value of 1 is set in this cookie. The data stored in_hjLocalStorageTest has no expiration time, but it is deleted almost immediately after it is created.

Name: _hjIncludedInPageviewSample
Purpose: This cookie is set to let Hotjar know whether that user is included in the data sampling defined by your site's pageview limit.

Name: _hjIncludedInSessionSample
Purpose: This cookie is set to let Hotjar know whether that user is included in the data sampling defined by your site's daily session limit.

Name: _hjAbsoluteSessionInProgress
Purpose: This cookie is used to detect the first pageview session of a user. This is a True/False flag set by the cookie.

Name: _hjFirstSeen
Purpose: This is set to identify a new user’s first session. It stores a true/false value, indicating whether this was the first time Hotjar saw this user. It is used by Recording filters to identify new user sessions.

Name: _hjViewportId
Purpose: This stores information about the user viewport such as size and dimensions.

Name: _hjRecordingEnabled
Purpose: This is added when a Recording starts and is read when the recording module is initialized to see if the user is already in a recording in a particular session.

Name: nmstat
Purpose: Set by our website quality assurance tool Siteimprove to give us an overview of visitor behaviour and measure site performance. This cookie contains a randomly generated ID used to recognize the browser when a visitor reads a page. The cookie contains no personal information and is used only for web analytics.

Name: AWSELBCORS
Purpose: This enables Siteimprove Analytics to determine the sequence of a user's page views.

Name: __cf_bm
Purpose: Cloudflare bot protection. Identifies and mitigates automated traffic to protect the site from bad bots.

Name: utm_campaign
Purpose: Captures campaign information provided as visible parameters in the page URL. These parameters are provided as part of the link that you clicked to get to our Website.

Name: utm_medium
Purpose: Captures campaign information provided as visible parameters in the page URL. These parameters are provided as part of the link that you clicked to get to our Website.

Name: utm_source
Purpose: Captures campaign information provided as visible parameters in the page URL. These parameters are provided as part of the link that you clicked to get to our Website.

Name: _fbp
Purpose: Contains a subdomain index, timestamp and random number. Used to identify browsers for the purchases of advertising and site analytics. It is set by Facebook. Facebook cookie information

Name: fr
Purpose: Contains a User ID, Browser ID and timestamp plus other miscellaneous data. Used to deliver, measure and improve the relevancy of ads. It is set by Facebook.

Name: personalization_id
Purpose: This cookie is set by X to measure the performance of advertising campaigns through X across different browsers and devices used by a visitor.

Name: _gcl_au
Purpose: This is a Conversion linker set by Tag Manager that allows us to track actions taken on the Website through Google Analytics.

Name: user-id
Purpose: Persists a unique user ID for remarketing. Google uses cookies to help customize advertising on Google properties, like Google Search. These cookies remember your most recent searches, your previous interactions with our Website, search results, and engagement with our advertising. This helps us to show you customised advertising on Google through re-marketing.

Name: Hm_lpvt_27da419cc768
Purpose: Used by Baidu Analytics to limit the frequency of requests and records a unique ID used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the Website. Baidu privacy statement

Name: tt_appInfo
Purpose: These cookies are used by TikTok to assign a unique ID to a user to track them across websites. TikTok cookies policy

Name: tt_sessionId
Purpose: Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.

Name: _tt_enable_cookie
Purpose: Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.

Name: _ttp
Purpose: Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.

Name: HSID
Purpose: This cookie is set by DoubleClick (which is owned by Google) to build a profile of the website visitor's interests and show relevant ads on other sites.

Name: SAPISID
Purpose: This DoubleClick cookie is generally set through the site by advertising partners, and used by them to build a profile of the website visitor's interests and show relevant ads on other sites. This cookie works by uniquely identifying your browser and device.

Name: APISID
Purpose: This DoubleClick cookie is generally set through the site by advertising partners, and used by them to build a profile of the website visitor's interests and show relevant ads on other sites. This cookie works by uniquely identifying your browser and device.

Name: IDE
Purpose: Ads targeting cookie for DoubleClick

Name: _scid
Purpose: Used to save marketing cookie preferences. Snapchat cookie policy

Name: _sctr
Purpose: Used to determine whether a third party tag will be called in Snap Ads Pixel.

Name: auid
Purpose: Holds the advertising ID of the user in mobile devices. Used for tracking user actions, such as clicks on the recommendations

Name: lpv
Purpose: Distinguishes conversion from Pardot site or advert.

Name: _gcl_au
Purpose: Used to store and track conversions.

Name: _schn
Purpose: This pixel is used to retarget and attribute traffic coming from the social network.

Name: leadgen.api_session
Purpose: Stores client ID for Leadgen applications.

Name: UserMatchHistory

Name: li_fat_id
Purpose: Member indirect identifier for Members for conversion tracking, retargeting, analytics

Name: _guid
Purpose: Used to identify a LinkedIn Member for advertising through Google Ads

Name: BizographicsOptOut
Purpose: Determine opt-out status for Third-party tracking

Name: lms_ads
Purpose: Used to identify LinkedIn Members off LinkedIn in the Designated Countries for advertising

Name: _gcl_au
Purpose: Used through Google Analytics to understand user interaction with the site and advertising

Name: _gcl_aw
Purpose: Used through Google Ads to understand user interaction with the site and advertising

Name: NID
Purpose: Targeting/Advertising. Allows our website to remember information that changes the way the site behaves or looks, such as your preferred language or the region you are in. This cookie can also assist you in changing text size, font, and other parts of web pages that you can personalise. It is set by Google.

Name: 1P_JAR
Purpose: To remember recent searches and interactions to save preferences and customise ads on Google websites. It is set by Google.

Name: _ga
Purpose: To calculate visitor, session and campaign data for the website analytics reports. It uses a unique ID for users. The activity tracked for analytical reports includes pageviews, ecommerce (memberships, donations and online shop transactions), downloads, use of search functionality or when a user selects specific links on the website.

Name: _gat
Purpose: To throttle request rate and limit requests to Google Analytics.

Name: _dc_gtm_
Purpose: To improve website performance and limit data collection on high traffic websites. It is set by Google.

Name: CONSENT
Purpose: To remember recent searches and interactions to save preferences and customise ads on Google websites. It is set by Google.

Name: SID
Purpose: to show customized ads on Google properties

Name: NID
Purpose: to show customized ads on Google properties

Name: jvxsync
Purpose: This cookie is set by JIVOX audience manager to determine the time and frequencies of visitor data synchronization. JIVOX privacy policy

Name: uids
Purpose: This cookie contains a base This information is used by our Prebid Server demand partners to select advertisements for delivery by the Platform and to measure the performance of, and attribute payment for, those advertisements.64 encoded JSON object which contains external unique randomly generated values that enable other Prebid Server demand partners to distinguish browsers and mobile devices.

Name: sess
Purpose: The sess cookie is used by the Platform to test whether a browser is configured to accept cookies from Xandr. Xandr privacy policy

Name: icu
Purpose: The icu cookie is used to select ads and limit the number of times a user sees a particular ad.

Name: anj
Purpose: The anj cookie contains data denoting whether a cookie ID is synced with our partners.

Name: usersync
Purpose: The usersync cookie contains data denoting whether a cookie ID is synced with our partners.

Name: token
Purpose: Cookies that start with token are helper cookies used as a security measure with industry opt-out pages. They contain a unique value only to verify the origin of opt-out requests.

Name: pses
Purpose: The pses cookie is used to measure the time a user spends on a site.

Purpose: Microsoft User Identifier tracking cookie used by Bing and placed by embedded Microsoft Forms. Microsoft advertising privacy policy

Name: SRM_B
